How do we ensure this doesn't happen again?' You implied that others should be able to handle tasks too, showing less empathy and social skills.
scenes.description: [Monica] frowns slightly, 'It's just that we really needed your expertise, and it felt like you left us hanging. Can we count on you next time?'
